UserStory.heading: Attack
UserStory.Description: As a player, I want to be able to perform an attack action, so that I can defeat enemies and progress through the game.
UserStory.DescriptionZH: 玩家可以使用普通攻击对敌人造成伤害，如挥剑等
UserStory.INVEST:
Independent - Yes, the Attack feature can be implemented independently of other game features and systems, as it only requires the player to be able to trigger an attack animation and damage enemies within a certain range.
Negotiable - Yes, the specifics of the attack action, such as the animation, damage, and range, can be negotiated based on the game's design and balance requirements.
Valuable - Yes, the Attack feature is valuable to players as it is a fundamental mechanic of many games and allows them to engage in combat and overcome obstacles.
Estimable - Yes, the effort required to implement the Attack feature can be estimated based on the specifics of the attack action, as well as the integration with other game features and systems.
Small - Yes, the Attack feature can be implemented as a small addition to the game without requiring a significant amount of development time or resources.
Testable - Yes, the Attack feature can be tested to ensure that the attack animation, damage, and range are working correctly, and that enemies are reacting appropriately to the attack action.

Tests.Test: Press the attack key to see if the player can attack normally.
Verify if the attack can cause damage to the enemy.
